content:
@Alin Tcaci I recommend doing the mged tutorial tasks first before for get used to mged doing the chess tutorial. https://codein.withgoogle.com/dashboard/task-instances/5407953323032576/
https://codein.withgoogle.com/dashboard/task-instances/4810118344998912/
GOOD LUCK !!!
Curious why you say that @Thusal Ranawaka -- what's do you see as the difference between the chess tutorial and the mged tutorials?
@Sean I say it because before he doing the chess tutorial it will be better to do the mged tutorial tasks he will learn the basics of BRL-CAD then it will be easy for him to do the chess tutorial.

Sean I say it because before he doing the chess tutorial it will be better to do the mged tutorial tasks he will learn the basics of BRL-CAD then it will be easy for him to do the chess tutorial.

which basics do you feel are not adequately covered in the chess tutorial?
